title: Dead Frontier 2
notes: Game starts, after the initial loading screen the screen turns black and background music starts. Pressing Esc crashes the game.

title: Dead Frontier 2
notes: With dx11 the texture is bugged, but after change to dx9 the game works very well

title: Dead Frontier 2
notes: First run it enter dx11 and doesn't show the character/face. If you run in dx9 mode afterwards everything appears.

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 470 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.6-041806-generic, LLVM 6.0.0)
notes: Selecting the Directx 9 version works fine, other versions don't display character models (players, zombies). Only problem is the mouse locking glitch present in some games like Subnautica.
